description: An interesting conversion from a Victorian School to a Synagogue and Community Centre in the 1970s.

events.name: Drop in
events.notes: Please let us know if you plan to visit. Doing so allows the venue to plan ahead and you will be notified by email about any changes to the programme that might affect your visit.

factsheet.heading: History
paragraphs: Visitors will have the opportunity to read about the origin of the building until the present day.  Also learn of the presence of Jewish people in the Kingston area from Medieval times onwards  plus a look at how the members of Kingston Liberal Synagogue play an active part in the life of the local community.l

images.title: The Open Ark in the Synagogue of Kingston Liberal Synagogue

location.address: Rushett Road, Long Ditton, Kingston, KT7 0UX

name: Kingston Liberal Synagogue
